main_definition: The ocean refers to the vast body of salt water that covers most of Earth's surface, comprising interconnected seas and smaller bodies of salty water.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large expanse of sea, especially the main partly covered salt-water water body encircling the earth
meanings_and_examples.example: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An extensive metaphor for the unconscious mind or depths of human emotion and experience
meanings_and_examples.example: Diving into the ocean of his own feelings, he discovered a wealth of emotions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A vast quantity; immense amount or size
meanings_and_examples.example: The ocean of opportunities opened up for her after graduating from college.
